DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety effectiveness Penumbra Liberty Stent System adjunctive treatment embolic coil wide-neck , saccular , intracranial aneurysm internal carotid artery ( ICA ) . The Liberty Stent System implantable device comprise stent delivery system design adjunct embolic coil treatment wide-neck , saccular , intracranial aneurysm . It three component : implant , introducer sheath delivery wire assembly . The implant component make superelastic biocompatible nitinol tubular material . Patients present wide-neck , saccular , intracranial aneurysm internal carotid artery ( ICA ) cavernous segment carotid terminus ( include paraclinoid , ophthalmic , hypophyseal posterior communicate segment ) receive stent assist coil Penumbra Liberty Stent approve embolic coil currently market . Wide-neck aneurysm define neck ≥4mm dome-to-neck ratio < 2 . Each patient follow assessed 2 , 6 12 month enrollment .
DOC.brief_title: The Penumbra Liberty Trial : Safety Effectiveness Treatment Wide-Neck Intracranial Aneurysms
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year old A wideneck intracranial saccular aneurysm neck ≥ 4mm dome neck ratio < 2 ICA cavernous segment carotid terminus ( include paraclinoid , ophthalmic , hypophyseal posterior communicate segment ) Life expectancy > 12 month Signed Informed Consent Females pregnant intend become pregnant study . ( Females childbearing potential must urinary pregnancy test within 7 day enrollment ) Extradural aneurysm Known multiple untreated cerebral aneurysm study entry Recent history subarachnoid hemorrhage , intracranial hemorrhage , major surgery within one month enrollment Admission platelet < 50,000 know hemorrhagic diathesis , coagulation deficiency , oral anticoagulant therapy INR > 3.0 Contraindication angiography elevate creatinine know allergy angiographic contrast Contraindication CT and/or MRI scan Known allergy metal component Penumbra Liberty Stent System Evidence active infection ( WBC > 10x109 /L ) Any medical condition allow necessary followup study ( e.g. , preexist neurological psychiatric disease ) Current substanceabuse /illicit drug use Angiographic evidence arterial stenosis proximal target lesion could prevent device deployment Contraindications study medication ( heparin , aspirin , clopidogrel , radiographic contrast )
